title.rendered: Residential Design + Build Magazine Selects Two Eldorado Stone Profiles as Top 100 Products of 2012

content.rendered:
During the months of 2012, architects and builders have requested information about the products Residential Design + Build published. Two of Eldorado Stone’s products made the Top 100 of the most requested products of the year; Santa Maria Cypress Ridge and LedgeCut33.

Santa Maria Cypress Ridge is designed to reflect the poetic harmony and enduring characteristics of age-old hilltop offices.

LedgeCut33 is a highly textural yet contemporary, linear-style profile. Each stone is 3 inches high and comes in three different lengths.

Residential Design + Build provides architects, designers and builders with the information they need to create high-end custom homes by educating them about the efficiency and effectiveness of a close working relationship between the design and construction process.
